action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a red "T" on the left and a yellow "T" on the right, with a purple "U" in the middle.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.
DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a blue letter 'T' with a green letter 'L' and a gray cross shape to the right of the 'T'. There is also a blue letter 'L' to the right of the 'T'.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a red "T" on the left and a yellow "T" on the right, with a purple "U" in the middle.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the color of the letter "T" on the left side of your image?

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a blue letter 'T' with a green letter 'L' and a gray cross shape to the right of the 'T'. There is also a blue letter 'L' to the right of the 'T'.
QUESTION: What is the color of the letter "T" on the left side of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my image that may be different to your image. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: What is the color of the letter "L" on the right side of your image?

ANSWER: Red
QUESTION: What is the color of the letter "L" on the right side of your image? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.

ANSWER: Yellow
Now come to a decision. What do you think: are your picture and the other picture described the same picture?  Write "DECISION: same image" if you think they are the same picture or "DECISION: different images" if you think they are different pictures. Do not add anything else.
